title.rendered: Project Update: Concept for monitoring and understanding component use on production systems

content.rendered:
so… ive done it again.

Over the weekend I’ve been teaching myself Laravel and filament and I can’t believe I’ve been building full php applications from just vanilla php.

learning a new system can be intimidating especially at the point in your career I’m at, I’m expected to be specialising now.

but sod it im moving this project into Laravel and this is going to be my stepping stone into becoming a Laravel developer.

enjoy the selfie as the featured image I guess
